abstract: James Hillman, therapist and author whose theories animated the so-called men's movement of the 1990s, dies at age 85.
snippet: Mr. Hillman was a therapist and author whose theories helped revive interest in the ideas of Carl Jung and animated the so-called men’s movement in the 1990s.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Hillman was a therapist and author whose theories helped revive interest in the ideas of Carl Jung and animated the so-called men’s movement in the 1990s.

headline.main: James Hillman, Therapist in Men’s Movement, Dies at 85
headline.print_headline: James Hillman, 85, Therapist in Men’s Movement, Dies
